where can i get the prometheus patch XP
how do you patch it up anyway XP

Okay guys. do this. 

download http://www.psp-hacks.com/file/1931

then put the iso_tool folder into PSP/GAME

then run the program

Go to the person 3 portable game

Click patch

Then go to patch prometheus

It should work fine after that :D

thanks blaze7755 XD

it works now XD

Anyone who has a problem with this should go to pspslimhacks.com go to the custom firmware section and get the Prometheus CFW. You could patch it separately but it's way easier to just make your psp CFW 5.03 Prometheus or 5.50 Prometheus.
